Performance:
April 1979: The Tycoon's Exploit

Production: April 1979

Play: The Tycoon's Exploit (絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

Scenes:

The Melons Offered to Hisayoshi (瓜献上 / Uri kenjō)

The Gourd Trellis (夕顔棚 / Yūgaodana)

The Amagasaki Village (尼が崎 / Amagasaki)

Characters:

Harunaga (Oda Harunaga / 尾田春長)

Hisayoshi (Mashiba Hisayoshi (Ryosō, actually Hisayoshi) / 真柴久吉(旅僧実は))

Mitsuhide (Takechi Mitsuhide / 武智光秀)

Priest Abe (Abe Hōin / 安倍法印)

Priest Futen (Futenbō / 普天坊)

Naniwa-Chunagon Kanefuyu (Naniwa Chūnagon / 浪花中納言)

Rammaru (Morino Ranmaru / 森の蘭丸)

Jujiro (Takechi Jūjirō / 武智十次郎)

Samboshi (Sambōshimaru / 三法師丸)

Lady Ano (Anōno Tsubone / 阿野の局)

Shinobu (Koshimoto Shinobu / 腰元しのぶ)

Rikimaru (Morino Rikimaru / 森の力丸)

Sogi (Sōgibo / 宗祇坊)

Kanroku, a soldier (Chinpun Kanroku / 珍分勘六)

Masakiyo (Katō Masakiyo / 加藤正清)

Tamatsuyu (Tamatsuyu / 玉露)

Ekei (Antokuji Ekei / 安徳寺恵瓊)

Yamasaburo (Urabe Yamasaburō (Sanzaburō) / 浦辺山三郎)

Chozaemon (Shimizu Chōzaemon / 清水長左衛門)

Yariume (Tsuma Yariume / 妻やり梅)

Takakage (Kobaikawa (Kobaigawa) Takakage / 小梅川隆景)

Satsuki (Haha Satsuki / 母皐月)

Shioten (Shiōten Tajimano Kami (Hyakushō Chōbei) / 四王天田島頭 (百姓長兵衛実は四王天田島頭) (四王天但馬守))

Misao (Tsuma Misao / 妻操)

Hatsugiku (Yome Hatsugiku / 嫁初菊)

Yukinoya (Tsuma Yukinoya / 妻雪の谷)

Matsuyo (Ane Matsuyo / 姉松代)

Shigenari (Suzuki Shigenari / 鱸重成)

Page (Koshō / 小姓)

Keikaku (Keikaku Gimi / 慶覚君)

Hachiro (Saginomori Hachirō / 鷺森八郎)

Magoichi (Suzuki Magoichi / 鱸孫市)

Rokuro (Korezumi Rokurō / 是角六郎)

Shigewaka (Shigewakamaru / 重若丸)

Kiyohide Nakagawa (Nakagawa Kiyohide / 中川清秀)

Kenketsu (Sō Kenketsu / 僧献穴)

Kuno Bungonokami (Kuno Bungonokami / 九野豊後守)

Yosobei Akayama (Akayama Yosobei (Yosabei) / 赤山与三兵衛)

Kosasa, a maid (Koshimoto Kosasa / 腰元小笹)

Namie, a maid (Koshimoto Namie / 腰元浪江)

Saeda Tokuzen-in (Saeda Tokuzenin / 左枝徳善院)

Harutaka Oda (Oda Harutaka / 尾田春孝)

Katsuie Shibata (Shibata Katsuie / 柴田勝家)

Shogen Takigawa (Takigawa Shōgen / 滝川将監)

Morimasa Sakuma (Sakuma Morimasa / 佐久間盛政)

Masanori Fukushima (Fukushima Masanori / 福島正則)

Harunobu Oda (Oda Harunobu / 尾田春信)

Farmers (Hyakushō / 百姓)
